text:
\
@font-face {
    font-family: HelveaticaNeueLTS;\
    src: url("/static/fonts/Helvetica family/HelveticaNeueLTStd-Md.otf") format("opentype");        }\
\
@font-face {\
    font-family: HelveticaNeueLTStd-Roman;\
    src: url("/static/fonts/Helvetica family/HelveticaNeueLTStd-Roman.ttf") format("truetype");        }\
\
@font-face {\
    font-family: HelveticaNeueLTStd-light;\
    src: url("/static/fonts/Helvetica family/HelveticaNeueLTStd-Th.otf") format("opentype");        }\
\
@font-face {\
    font-family: HelveticaNeueLTStd-LightIt;\
    src: url("/static/fonts/Helvetica family/HelveticaNeueLTStd-LtIt.ttf") format("truetype");        }\
\
@font-face {\
    font-family: HelveticaNeueLTStd-Bold;\
    src: url("/static/fonts/Helvetica family/HelveticaNeueLTStd-Bd.otf") format("opentype");        }\
@font-face {\
    font-family: Fonetics;\
    src: url("/static/fonts/TimesLTStd-Phonetic.otf") format("truetype");\
}\
\
@font-face {\
    font-family: AGaramond;\
    src: url("/static/fonts/AGaramondPro-Regular.otf") format("opentype");\
}\
\
@font-face {\
    font-family: AGaramondItalic;\
    src: url("/static/fonts/AGaramondPro-Italic.otf") format("opentype");\
}\
\
@font-face {\
    font-family: AGaramondBold;\
    src: url("/static/fonts/AGaramondPro-Bold.otf") format("opentype");\
}\
\
#detailDescription {\
    font-family: AGaramond;\
    font-size: 19px;\
}\
#detailDescription > b {\
    font-family: AGaramondBold;\
    font-style:normal;\
    font-size: 15px;\
}\
\
#detailDescription > i {\
    font-family: AGaramondItalic;\
    font-style:normal;\
    font-weight: normal;\
}\
\
#detailDescription > losango {\
    color: #b9006e;\
    font-size: 13px;\
}\
\
#detailDescription > verbete {\
    font-family: AGaramondBold;\
    font-size: 20px;\
    color: rgb(236, 0, 140);\

}\
#detailDescription > ex {font-family: HelveticaNeueLTStd-light;}\
#detailDescription > ex > i{font-style:oblique;font-weight: normal;}\
#detailDescription > ex > italico{font-style:oblique;font-weight: normal;}
